name: CallSnap
short_description:
They say “a picture’s worth a thousand words”. How many times have you been in a situation where you’ve declined a phone call when you wish you could instantly show someone what you’re doing?
With CallSnap on Google Play, now you can...
CallSnap is more than an app, it’s a view into your life and a new and efficient way to communicate.

Next time you’re in a busy situation and can’t answer your phone, consider how much more informative you can be with your caller by sharing an instant photo with them.
All you have to do is slide the new CallSnap icon on your incoming call screen to the left.  CallSnap simultaneously declines the call and opens up the CallSnap camera app.

Show people why you can’t answer…and if you don’t like the photo, you can even retake it!
Snap yourself, snap your friends, or snap your situation…this is the button that makes CallSnap so much fun.
summary: A new way to manage calls by sharing a photo of what you're doing.
